Title: A mutex and semaphore without pthreads
Description: Using a few system calls on Linux, a mutex and semaphore can be implemented in only a few lines of code.

Title: Getting More from Tab Completion
Description: The ? operator in the IOS shell and the why shortcuts for contextual information are awesome.

Title: The Power of Go Templates
Description: Extending the behavior of Go Templates by creating new functions that can be called from within templates.
